page.title: 08PLAYGROUND GAMES (CONT.)
page.content: This is a game called "What's the time Mr. Wolf?" One person is "on". He or she stands against the wall and shuts his eyes. The other children stand about 10 metres away. Someone asks him the time. If he says 4 o'clock, you take 4 steps forward; 7 o'clock you take 7 steps forward and so on. As soon as he answers with "dinner-time", you have to run away and if he catches you, you have to be "on" next and the game starts all over again. This is a very traditional playground game and it has been played in this part of England, certainly in Norfolk and Suffolk for many, many years. It mostly appeals to children between the ages of 5 and 8 years.
